Description: Worn green glazed composition shabti of Ankhpsamtek with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the waist is inscribed with three(remaining) rows of Hieroglyphic text; back-pillar; the leg section is lost.
Condition: incomplete - leg section lost; surface worn
Acquisition name: Donated through: Mrs C H Simpson
